api_list.api_description: Estimate the age of a person based on their first name.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The first name to estimate age for.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: The country code to improve estimation accuracy.

api_list.api_description: Get information about a specific host.

required_parameters.name: host
required_parameters.description: The host to query (IPv4 address, hostname, or domain name).

query: I would like to know the estimated age of someone with the name 'John' from the United States. Additionally, I want information on any malicious activity associated with the domain 'example.com'.
